Owing to its open admissions policy, LBHC welcomes enrollment from any adult with a high school diploma or GED. content.source_2: Little Bighorn Battlefield National Monument Little Bighorn Battlefield National Monument preserves the site of the June 25 and 26, 1876, Battle of the Little Bighorn, near Crow Agency, Montana, in the United States. Custer National Cemetery, on the battlefield, is part of the national monument.
